comment.title: comment
comment.description: Plain text feedback provided by the scorer of a Result.

description.en: Plain text feedback provided by the scorer of a Result.

curveFactor.title: curveFactor
curveFactor.description: A scale factor to be used in adjusting the totalScore.

description.en: A scale factor to be used in adjusting the totalScore.

curvedTotalScore.title: curvedTotalScore
curvedTotalScore.description: The total score earned by the learner after applying a curveFactor to a method for computing a scaled score; e.g., adjusting the score equal to the sum of 100 - curvedFactor(100 - totalScore).

description.en: The total score earned by the learner after applying a curveFactor to a method for computing a scaled score; e.g., adjusting the score equal to the sum of 100 - curvedFactor(100 - totalScore).

extraCreditScore.title: extraCreditScore
extraCreditScore.description: The number of extra credit points earned by the learner.

description.en: The number of extra credit points earned by the learner.

id.title: id
id.description: The Event or Entity identifier.  For an Event, the id MUST be a UUID expressed as a URN using the form urn:uuid:<UUID> per RFC 4122.  For Entities a valid IRI MUST be specified. The IRI MUST be unique and persistent. The IRI SHOULD also be dereferenceable, i.e., capable of returning a representation of the resource.  An Entity MAY be provisioned with a URI employing the URN scheme in cases where a Linked Data friendly HTTP URI is either unavailable or inappropriate.

description.en: The Event or Entity identifier.  For an Event, the id MUST be a UUID expressed as a URN using the form urn:uuid:<UUID> per RFC 4122.  For Entities a valid IRI MUST be specified. The IRI MUST be unique and persistent. The IRI SHOULD also be dereferenceable, i.e., capable of returning a representation of the resource.  An Entity MAY be provisioned with a URI employing the URN scheme in cases where a Linked Data friendly HTTP URI is either unavailable or inappropriate.

maxResultScore.title: maxResultScore
maxResultScore.description: The maximum score permitted for a Result.

description.en: The maximum score permitted for a Result.

normalScore.title: normalScore
normalScore.description: The score earned by the learner before adding the extraCreditScore, subtracting the penaltyScore or applying the curveFactor, if any.

description.en: The score earned by the learner before adding the extraCreditScore, subtracting the penaltyScore or applying the curveFactor, if any.

penaltyScore.title: penaltyScore
penaltyScore.description: The number of points deducted from the normalScore due to an infraction such as submitting an Attempt after the due date.

description.en: The number of points deducted from the normalScore due to an infraction such as submitting an Attempt after the due date.

resultScore.title: resultScore
resultScore.description: The result score awarded to the learner.  A result score can be updated.

description.en: The result score awarded to the learner.  A result score can be updated.

totalScore.title: totalScore
totalScore.description: A score earned by the learner equal to the sum of normalScore + extraCreditScore - penaltyScore. This value does not take into account the effects of curving.

description.en: A score earned by the learner equal to the sum of normalScore + extraCreditScore - penaltyScore. This value does not take into account the effects of curving.

dateCreated.title: dateCreated
dateCreated.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was created.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was created.

dateModified.title: dateModified
dateModified.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was last changed or modified.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was last changed or modified.

description.title: description
description.description: A brief, plain-text representation of the resource.

description.en: A brief, plain-text representation of the resource.

name.title: name
name.description: A string value comprising a word or phrase by which the resource is known.

description.en: A string value comprising a word or phrase by which the resource is known.

description: A Caliper Result represents a grade applied to an assignment submission.
